column4: some flash interactive 'movies' (games, whatever), doesnt work with gnash. How do I install the non-free flash? If I install it just by apt-get install flashplugin-nonfree I don't have it as an addon to firefox. How do I fix this?
if you have 64bit ubuntu download the flash 10 alpha from adobe and just copy the .so file into the firefox plugins dir which having firefox closed and uninstall all other flash plugins before
then the ubuntu packages version should work
